title: Conjunction
alt: The IAU is sad to announce that at 00:39 UTC on December 22nd, Jupiter and Saturn did unfortunately come into contact, and appear to have blooped together.
transcript:
Caption above the panel: What people imagine astronomers observing a conjunction are like
[Cueball and Ponytail are both looking through telescopes at the conjunction of Jupiter and Saturn.]
Cueball: 6.15 arcminutes!
Ponytail: Stupendous! This confirms Einstein!Caption above the panel: What they're actually like
[The same picture with different spoken sentences.]
Cueball: Wow! Look how close they are!
Ponytail: It's so cool!!
Cueball: Now kiiiisssss!!
Ponytail: Dooo iiit!
